sentences.en: Forty-four people died in the space of five days.
sentences.cn: 五天里死了四十四个人。

sentences.en: Forty-four years later, in 1928, other editors finished it.
sentences.cn: 44年后的1928年，其他编辑完成了它。

sentences.en: Forty-four states have lotteries, 29 have casinos, and most of these states are to varying degrees dependent on—you might say addicted to—revenues from wagering.
sentences.cn: 44个州有彩票，29个州有赌场，其中大多数州都不同程度地依赖于，你也可以说是沉迷于赌博的收入。
